key_talking_points: Carter Verhaeghe missed a shot wide right at 18:54 remaining in the first period. Shortly after, Gustav Forsling registered a shot on goal, which led to a stoppage in play due to the puck going into the benches.
The faceoff following the stoppage was won by Edmonton's Connor McDavid against Florida's Sam Bennett in the neutral zone. Edmonton is attempting to close the one-goal deficit early.
for_commentary_agent.context: The game remains close early in the first. Shots on goal and faceoff wins are moderately important. Time to set the scene, highlight early performances.

task_details.specific_guidance: The game is closely contested early. Focus on the shot differential and faceoff battle, but be ready for quick transitions.
